item.title: Cannonballs going down after a ball fires?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Base is Delta, for all you DeltaScape haters, go bash with your RS2D, Devo, and Shards.
(Delta is based off of Devo, btw…)

Codes:
sM(“You have “+CannonBalls+” cannonballs in your cannon.”);
CannonBalls -= 1;
public int CannonBalls = 30;

I know I set it as 30, that’s going to be max cannonballs in cannon at once. (Same as rs…) Pic:

Read full topic
item.source: Cannonballs going down after a ball fires?
